Welcome to Tormented official Advertisment thread. We thrive to give you, the players, the best time possible. Our staff team consists of mature and hardworking members who've proved they are capable of such responsibility.

[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/35l9lyf.png[/img] [b]Features[/b] - 24/7 Uptime - Majority of skills trainable - Webclient - Highscores (Not yet released) - Unique Home environment - Kill/Death Ratio - Friendly staff and community - Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demons, Nex AND MUCH MORE! - Barrows - Vote - Experienced Coders - God Wars Dungeon - Start Package - Several Dungeons - HD/LD Full-screen/Re-sizable - Active Staff Team - Character Appearance Customization - Comfortable Exp Rates - Slayer Tasks (With Difficulty) - Stable and Balanced Economy - Tasks Menu - SkinColor - Need Staff!

Site | Web Client | Vote

Welcome to Tormented official Advertisment thread. We thrive to give you, the players, the best time possible. Our staff team consists of mature and hardworking members who’ve proved they are capable of such responsibility.

The staff team;

Sarah

Features

  • 24/7 Uptime

  • Majority of skills trainable

  • Unique Home environment
